page.title: 18Traffic Survey
page.content:
We carried out a traffic survey on the road going from{Wareham to Poole.}We found that there is more traffic in the early morning and early evening.
This probably shows people are travelling to and from, work. Holton Heath Industrial Estate and the Admiralty Research Establishment employ many local people.
Many lorries and vans use the road for the Industrial Estate, and the Admiralty Research Establishment, but also the road is important for traffic between Wareham and Poole.
The road is straight and traffic can travel fast, but there are two schools sited along the road, so the{road can} {be dangerous.}
